title: Q9 Word Choice MC--Shared Passage 1
prompt: Which word or phrase would <u>best</u> fit in the blank in sentence 9 to clarify the transition between ideas?
feedback: "In this situation" is the most appropriate choice because this sentence provides an example of why real-world experience is more important than facts learned in school. If you used the phrase "for example," the connection with the capital of South Dakota wouldn't make sense. The writer is going back to the original idea that real-world experience is the best education. "In this situation" indicates that the writer is applying his examples of skills that are useful and not useful to the previous sentence.
